resources.string: The app has been developed to ease ways on how farmers will interact globally in the country and also they will be able to get notified with Agricultural events all over the country. Farmers will also have conversations with agricultural officers in control. For Suppliers, they will have to purchase an account for kes 900 which will be renewd after every 3 months. Suppliers will have privileges of posting there items where buyers can purchase their items at their own cost.
The app NOTE: RECOMMENDS FOR VALID USER DETAILS TO BE USED.

This account will give you an upper priority where you can be able to post your issues or complaints you are facing. The issue can be addressed through replies from your fellow farmers and can be later be justified by the responsible Agricultural Officer. There will be also a chatpage for groupchats where issues discussed randomly.
